killer_condition_types.is_option: The selection is present in the question options
killer_condition_types.isnt_option: The selection is not present in the question options
killer_condition_types.are_options: The set of options of the question is present
killer_condition_types.arent_options: The set of options of the question is not present
killer_condition_types.some_option: Any option of the whole question is present
killer_condition_types.none_choice: No choice of the whole of the question we are present

types.default: Enter the value to compare when discarding
types.range: Enter the initial value of the range, then the final value.
types.int: Enter a numeric value to compare and discard

answer_preview.info: The answer will be taken taking into account that it is {{v}} as expected.
answer_preview.info_2: The response will be evaluated taking into account that it is expected {{v}}.
answer_preview.info_3: The response will be evaluated taking into account that {{v}}.

state.approved: With this answer a ​​candidate would be Approved
state.discarded: With this answer a ​​candidate would be Discarded

attributes.description: Text of the question to be asked

errors.weighing: The sum of the weight of each question should not be different than 100
